resources.string: Thank you for downloading Itinerum MTL.
Your participation is appreciated. To help our research, please answer the following questions.
TERMS OF USE OF ITINERUM MTL
You are invited to closely read the following information before deciding whether or not to participate in a transportation study conducted by Concordia.

Itinerum MTL is an application developed by Concordia University. Its use is governed by the ethics guidelines of Concordia University.


A. PURPOSE


The purpose of this research project is to collect and analyse travel behaviour data of users on the transportation network with smartphones. Based on this data (origin and destination of trips, number of trips, transportation modes, etc.) we will be better able to predict mobility demand and plan the development of the transport network as a function of the needs of users.


B. PROCEDURES


C. CONTEST


D. CONDITIONS OF PARTICIPATION


E. DECLARATION OF CONSENT


I ACCEPT THESE CONDITIONS (mandatory to participate in the study)
Almost done! Let’s just quickly go over the basics on how to use Itinerum MTL.
The app will remain open in the background in order to automatically record your trips.
Having an active SIM card improves location recording results even if you don’t have a data plan.
Please try and keep your phone outside of your pocket or on your dashboard to ensure the best connection whenever possible.
This button lets you add trips or edit trip information.
This one let’s you access the settings for your Itinerum app.
And this one allows you to review the study information at any time.
For more information, consult our FAQs
Itinerum MTL is still running! Tap for more info
Pausing recording stops data collection and can prevent raffle eligibility
Thank you for using Itinerum MTL!

By using Itinerum MTL, you are at the heart of an ongoing research project! Itinerum MTL is an implementation of Itinerum, a travel survey application developed at Concordia University. By allowing the app to run in the background of your phone, you will share information on your trips for up to 30 days. The application will allow us to test and develop methods to better understand travel behaviour through the use of smartphones. Ultimately, your participation will help us improve transportation planning. 

If you would like to report a technical problem, please send an email to: zachary.patterson@concordia.ca 

Frequently Asked Questions: 
https://www.itinerum.ca/faq.html
Congratulations! You have validated %d trips. You will be entered in the draw for prizes. Would you like to continue validating trips?
You will no longer be prompted to validate trips but can still participate in the study for up to %d days. If you no longer wish to participate, you can uninstall the app.
Itinerum MTL follows these research ethics. Please review and agree to them to use the application
An access code for the survey you wish to participate in is required. Please tap here to enter a code.
Adding a destination will not increment the number of validated trips.
What mode or (combination of modes) do you typically use to commute to your %s location?
Do you use any alternative mode (or combination of modes) of travel to your %s location?
